post:
**Support:** https://client.tetahost.com/submitticket.php
**Email us:** support@tetahost.com

**Packages features:**

* 1Gbps Uplink
* 1IPv4 and 1IPv6
* KVM
* Custom ISO upload
* VNC access
* Instant provision
* VMmanager control panel

**VDS1 - 4 EUR/month - 40 EUR/year~ 4.48USD/mo - 44.84/year**

* 1 GB DDR4 RAM
* 15 GB NVMe storage
* 2 TB monthly traffic
* 1 vCPU core
Order link: https://client.tetahost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=15

**VDS2 - 6 EUR/month - 60 EUR/year ~ 6.73USD/mo - 67.26/year**

* 2 GB DDR4 RAM
* 25 GB NVMe storage
* unlimited monthly traffic
* 2 vCPU core
Order link: https://client.tetahost.com/cart.php?a=add&pid=16


**Test IP**
Test IPv4: 188.40.203.192
Test IPv6: 2a01:4f8:151:90e5:1::1

**Datacenter:** Hetnzer, Falkenstein

**Available Payment Methods:**

* PayPal
* Credit/Debit Card (Stripe)
* Bitcoin

For any custom offer you can contact us :)

Regards,
